content.body:
> <@smaug:mozilla.org> I was just looking at some helper page for someone not so familiar with various specs.

https://w3c.github.io/mdn-spec-links/ is the closest thing I have this point â€” as far as whatâ€™s up-to-date and actively maintained

â€¦however that page doesnâ€™t currently/yet have links to the specs themselves â€”Â but I can add that

Unlike https://platform.html5.org/ it doesnâ€™t organize the specs into any category groupings â€” and I really have no plans to ever make it do that.

But the nature of it is, it represents the set of specs that we actually have some documentation for in MDN. So itâ€™s fairly complete as far as representing what specs constitute the feature set for the web platform.
